name: Cryo (Marshall Cannon)
description:
Cryo is an unforgiving survival game set aboard a derelict spaceship. Developed by Runner-Up Studios in 2017-2018, Cryo was our first attempt at a commercial title. Unfortunately the project was never finished, but it was a great learning experience for everybody involved.

Developed with the LOVE game framework (https://love2d.org/).

Credits:

Marshall Cannon - Coding and Game Design (https://twitter.com/marshall_cannon)

Keaton Clark - Art (https://twitter.com/PixelKeats)

Nikolas Santiago - Music and Sound Design (https://niksantiago.bandcamp.com/)
